website_summaries.verdict: Decent video quality at a very good price.
pros: WiFi compatible and comes with an App
cons: This model comes with good accessories, but doesn't have good instructions on how to use them

website_summaries.verdict: If you want 4K video and you're on a tight budget, this is the camcorder for you.
pros: The app works well for transferring images and remote control of the camera
cons: Quirky and takes some practice to figure out
Doesn't offer the versatility of more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: It works well if you know how to use it properly!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first waterproof camera. I bought it for my snorkeling trip in Thailand. The place that we went snorkeling was a bit deep so most of pictures that I took from the surface were not very good. But If you use this camera to take pictures close up it works well. I think it depends on depth and lighting too. Also no leaks and it’s very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tubtim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great! I don't do any action sport but I needed a camera for underwater pictures and videos during my vacation. And the result is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Betty breezy

customer_reviews.title: The worst product that I have bought ever.  It's a waste of money. DON'T BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this product has such a high rating score. This cam is a robber. The quality of pictures are similar to the pictures taken with my first mobile have been 17 years ago. The videos are the worst. I know that it is cheap but no too cheap to be such a bad product. My disappointment with this product was too bad, I had not willing to make a review and I thought that I do not want that another more person to lose their money in that way. And the memory is unstable. The worst product that I have bought ever.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera to take on our trip to Maui. We tried it out beforehand and found the playback to be of poor quality with lines waving through the video. We decided to give it another try and bought it again, Just returned from Hawaii was so disappointed with poor quality of footage of our snorkel experience. Horrible color, terrible video with wavy lines still on playback. Horrible product. Don't waste your time and money for the frustration. You are basically on your own to figure out how to operate it because the instructions are vague.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cameral for a trip to Key West. Pictures and videos turned out great!! Video is the default for this camera, which caused me many lost pictures and the only reason I didn't give a 5 star rating. Easy to use, Never had any problems with using under water.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for my Hawaii Snorkeling Adventure
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great for my Hawaii Snorkeling Adventure, Great clear pictures!! Noticed that pictures turned out the Best/clearest when the sun was on my back. Otherwise it still takes good pictures its just that you'll get more of a water color in the picture. Awesome camera, I don't have/used a gopro but, I do have another underwater camera that I've used on previous vacations and this is leaps and bounds better!! This was awesome to take video as well of the Turtle I followed around for awhile and the 4' Moray eel and Barracuda.
customer_reviews.author: Vette racer

customer_reviews.title: A awesome action camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera record well, takes good quality pictures, and good quality sound !!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Brisby

customer_reviews.title: You cannot beat the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Underwater footage outstanding!! I do a lot of icefishing and this camera is beyond my expectations for quality!! Quality is just as good even if you are not using it underwater. I am 100% satisfied!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and runs well for the price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was pretty skeptical reading certain reviews. But after trying it out a couple of times I am pretty satisfied with this product. Recording in 4K was pretty choppy but after loading it onto my laptop, the videos seemed to run a bit more smoothly. Def. Runs better in 1080. The quality overall could use some work! But for the price, it does pretty well! I would def. Recommend this to folks just starting out with underwater footage who can't yet afford a gopro
customer_reviews.author: Aja Crayton

customer_reviews.title: AKASO EK7000 Review
customer_reviews.text: I just tested the waterproof casing of this camera and proved to be satisfying, I placed one of my aquarium display inside the bucket half full of water and submerged the camera to take a screenshot of it, I tried to stabilize the camera while I pressed the remote to take the shot. I have to put some lighting because it is too dark outside. You can't go wrong with this camera, I'll bring this camera to my trip to Legoland and to a cruise in couple of months. Just check the reviews, there's a lot of positive feedbacks regarding this product. Buy one and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PRODUCT. NOT EVEN WORTH $50
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to Hawaii. There are no instructions that come with this, so good luck if you’re not familiar with this kind of stuff. The camera would freeze whenever I tried to use it & not take any pictures/videos or even turn on/off. The pictures it did take were all bright white & blurry. This camera is awful. I just wanted pictures of my trip during my snorkeling excursions & this camera did not do that. It couldn’t even take pictures of my resort. They were do pixelated. Thank goodness for my phone camera because this one suck. Very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No manual included, just asks for good reviews for freebies
customer_reviews.text: The description states there is a user manual inside. It's actually listed a few times. There isn't a user manual. There a picture book to set it up which doesn't help. There's a web address for the user manual and it when to a page with a pic of a guy using the camera and it says the page no longer exists. Why don't they supply customers with a manual?!! There is a card in there that says I can get free products if I leave a review. I don't want your bribes. I want a product manual.
customer_reviews.author: ww

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, there are some  major issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that when the device is in the waterproof container that it has some serious problems. For example, the video will cut out or get digital fuzz were everything is green, freezes or video just blacks out. Sound while in the waterproof container is so low you can barely hear it in playback with the speakers turned all the way up. Now if you use it outside the waterproof container it works great. ***** Update 4/8/2019 ****** Unit freezes up after a few minutes of recording and the only way to get it to respond is to remove the battery and then reinstall it and it will record a few more minutes and then freeze up again.
customer_reviews.author: viper222a

customer_reviews.title: Camera freeze and worst support
customer_reviews.text: AKASO EK7000 Camera froze about 1/3rd of the time even after trying 2 different SD cards and re-formatting it. Many reviews stated they had freezing issues as well. After Akaso support asked me to do firmware upgrade, the unit died and it never powered on. Then they asked me to pay to have it shipped to East coast and then additionally pay $22 for replacment unit. Rediculous. Thankfully I'm able to return it via Amazon since it was still within eligible return date. In addition to Amazon free return, I could have had new replacement sent for no cost but chose not to because they have the worst support ever and thus will never buy their product again.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Awful lens Flair.
customer_reviews.text: Don't shoot the action if it's even remotely in the direction of the sun with this camera. Huge diffraction circles! The sun is high in the sky and about 40 degrees to the upper right. See pictures. Note: I'm trying to figure out if this is a defective camera.and should be returned. Anybody have a clue?. Something doesn't seem right to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I just received the camera and it works perfectly. I like the weight of the camera, the functions and all the mounting accessories. I can't wait to put it to the test
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent trip to Hawaii. I thought I would try it for the price. I was highly impressed with almost every aspect. I used it for still and video. I took it snorkeling several times and the video turned out amazing! The only flaw I came across was, 2 days in, the self-timer stopped working. It hasn't worked since, either. It freezes up if I try to take a timed photo, forcing me to have to turn it off. Other than that, it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Coskrey

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the quality was pretty good, needed a camera for our cruise to Cozumel and it worked out great when we went snorkeling. The upload quality turns out a bit different though. The WiFi worked good when I would have my chest or head harness on, I could just connect to my phone to see everything. Waterproof case worked great camera is still working 🤞🏾 Battery life was good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited about this gift until he reviewed the footage he recorded. It was blurry and not at all High quality picture clarity. It lacked sharpness and definition. It looked awful. Words on pictures and boxes in the video background couldn’t be read. Our cellphone video footage was perfect and much better. We read all directions and purchased a new high quality as card that supports 4k. Ties didn’t help. Super disappointed. I am hoping that this is a defective unit and you are safe to buy but I don’t know. It was a Christmas gift and purchased in advance so our return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Green Family

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my honeymoon. We traveled cross country visiting 16 different states. The camera works great and takes great pictures. Especially under water. The only thing that you need to make sure of, is when you’re taking pictures, make sure the lenses are wiped clean otherwise you will have blurry pictures. I keep my camera in the water proof case and have had some blurry pics due to dirty lenses. Otherwise great camera for the price! Updated to add the 5th star! The customer service was excellent!! Highly recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: sir smoothies

customer_reviews.title: Untrustworthy camera app
customer_reviews.text: What a total waste What can I say Let me start with the readiness of this garbage 1 out of 3 times laughable The quality is ok when it works that is The app total garbage it needs a lot of development but since that’s not priority for these plp is not going to happen anytime soon I lost many memories to this garbage Either corrupt files app not connecting and transferring files not turning on during trips dead battery after 2 min You name it Isles truly a complete waste You get what you pay for definitely Getting a GoPro and this is going back
customer_reviews.author: Mach1k

customer_reviews.title: Seeing is believing. Dont believe other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Seeing is believing. Don't belive the other reviews because they are getting paid to give good reviews. The product also came with something that stated if u leave a 5 star reveiw on Amazon you'll receive a bunch of things. The wife and I were very excited to get this and try it out. We tried and sent it back 2 days later because the picture was EXTREMELY grainy looking (especially if dark like indoors) and the picture was very grainy and pixelated if u were outside. Just save your money and get a gopro 7. At least u know your getting something good.
customer_reviews.author: Shane&Ashley Richard

customer_reviews.title: NO Microphone!
customer_reviews.text: I feel a bit duped after recording my first long video with this. Upon playback of this important footage I realized this camera does not have a microphone and therefore does not record audio. I feel intentionally mislead as the description does not mention this nor did any of the reviews I read. How can this camera have 12k 5 star reviews, but cannot record audio? So far I've recorded 3 hours of beautiful silent film. At least it actually records video, unlike my POS GoPro Hero 3 which died from not being used for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baughn

customer_reviews.title: New King Of The Hill
customer_reviews.text: Needed a camera to record some trail riding with. The value of this 4K action camera is like the quality of its shots: spectacular! I was reluctantly set on buying a GoPro, then I noticed this 4K action camera on Amazon. The reviews were favorable and the amount of accessories included, for the price, was simply too hard to walk away from. So I didn’t, and I’m stoked about it. This 4K action camera hold its own against the masses, for a third of the price. A THIRD OF THE PRICE!! What else needs to be said, except stop wasting your money on GoPro and get an equally quality picture for a better price for a pretty nifty-looking 4K camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: it's a $50 camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second action cam to use for a different angle. The reviews I saw made it look impressive. My main camera is a Gopro Hero 4 so the video and audio quality just doesn't compare. If you were using 2 or 3 of these you could get by ok but this one just can't begin to keep up. It's kinda like a Volkswagen and a Ferrari having a race. One handy item with it that I didn't think I would use in the remote control. For videos, I just don't see much use but for snapping a picture it does "ok".
customer_reviews.author: Rockerdude004

customer_reviews.title: Corrupted files
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've been having trouble importing the video on my PC and when I did, the files were all corrupted or unable to play. I haven't checked up any solutions for this, but so far, only one file is able to play. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but I assume it was just insert the card and record. It says the files are .mov, but quicktime or vlc won't play them. When I try and playback them on the actual device, it says the files are unable to play and get a green/grey bar across the screen.
customer_reviews.author: JAGJAGJAG

customer_reviews.title: Fair value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner action camera to start with. Nothing fancy, but a great value. I shot a few videos and they look pretty good, not awesome, but the balance between quality and price paid is fair. 4 stars just because it didn't come with sd memory card, I had to spend an extra $20 for a 64gig. I would have paid an extra $10 for the camera all together if it had an SD card. They are pretty cheap on Amazon, I'm sure Akaso guys would afford that. All in all, my son is happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, water proof but very low-quality images
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping this was going to be great but...it was not. It's easy to use and the case it comes with is water proof, but the video is horrible quality and no where near the 4k that is advertised. Taking it hiking, repelling and just walking were horrible. Once we got back from our trip and looked at the videos and photos all of them were blurry, videos were shakey and very disappointed that our trip was not captured liked we'd hoped. The pictures literally look as if they are just screen shots of a poor video. If it's something important, spring for the Go-Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Phillips

customer_reviews.title: updated review to: DO NOT BUY does not work AT ALL to the company worked to help me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Maui trip when we snorkeled. Nothing worse than getting ready to film and the item does not work. It would not accept the 'wifi code' and from there you are left with nothing but a bunch of plastic. Unfortunately the return window closed while on the trip. DO NOT BUY as this is not a reliable item. For me it is $80 down the drain. NOT HAPPY! UPDATE----------------------------- The company has sent me a new one which works. Thank you for doing this. Although I wish it worked originally, I find the company is trying to compensate me.
customer_reviews.author: ltb

customer_reviews.title: Broke Within A Day
customer_reviews.text: A button broke after the first use. While using it on our honeymoon, the function to switch from picture mode to video mode hardly worked. Also there were multiple times when the device wouldn’t record or take pictures and it would have to be turned off and turned back on. I felt like I was trying to fix it so much that my wife was getting frustrated since I wasn’t experiencing the honeymoon. By day 3 of the trip we just used our phones with the $6 water proof bag cases. I would suggest those over this device.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Oster

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I compare it to my GoPro 7 Black. I use them on my helmet, riding my dirt bike. Pic quality - same vid quality - 1080/30 very close vid stabilization- very close, better than some older GoPro's sound/mic- very good. heat- very low, much less that GoPro battery life- using 1350 batteries, all acc. stuff turned off. 1 hr. weight- very light !!!! easy to use- YES !!! I drill holes in my cases to let air flow in and heat out. This camera never got hot. And sound quality is excellent.! I lost it on 4 th ride. Want to buy another one now. looking at the Brave 7 LE model.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: This camera ... is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: Talk about bang for your buck! This camera is incredible. Lightweight, crisp images (and audio!!), standard memory card / usb interfaces. Attached is a video taken recently of a crayfish grab gone wrong. I love this camera - it has a ton of mounting options, easy access to the battery compartment, and out of the box waterproof (completely) to what I can attest to be at least 20ft. Or 1+ atmosphere. I'm _literally_ writing this review right now because I'm back in my order history looking to purchase another. If you're thinking about getting yourself a weatherproof action cam, I can't possibly recommend this one enough.
customer_reviews.author: Switch

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had two cheap action cameras, under $50 with more functions and capabilities. I decided to bought this camera, for buyers review. This camera, have not image stabilization, does have not zoom, does have not camera angle modification. I had not read all the information about the akaso E7000 and It was my fault. I assumed that all these functions would have the camera. Again, my fault. The batteries is other failure point, they do not last more than one hour filming. The wifi mode works ok. In short, I would not have bought it, I would not recommend it, best would be put your money in another model with more functions and capabilities, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Barba Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use! No refund unless you buy warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used this camera, the buckle which connects the mount to the camera (in the waterproof casing) unlatched while surfing. the camera fell into the ocean, never to be seen again. I called amazon and explained that my camera didn't even last an hour but they did not provide a refund. I never even got to view any photos. Huge waste of money. I'm gonna give this a NoPro
customer_reviews.author: TraSEA

customer_reviews.title: You will not find a better action camera at this price point
customer_reviews.text: If you're flipping between 2 action cameras trying to decide which one to pull the trigger on...pick this one!! You will not find a better action camera at this price point. Bought for my upcoming vacation, allowed my 2 youngest children to test it out. Video quality is great. App/WiFi feature makes downloading videos super easy, you will have to try both recommended apps though. Sound quality through water proof case isn't horrible. Did notice a tiny bit of fogging in waterproof case which means there is a bit of leakage somewhere. Overall though for $50 this is a fantastic purchase!! In fact I just ordered 3 more for our family to use on vacation and out doing charters
customer_reviews.author: Tara R

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used several of these from mounted on a motorcycle, to scuba diving on shipwrecks, strapped on R/C vehicles and bashed around, to hauled underneath drones. Despite being a fraction of the cost of other brands, these have always worked perfectly for me. They come with a ton of mounts, a waterproof case (and it has worked to 100 feet in frigid New England waters), extra battery, etc. You can pay more for a similar product, then cringe when you lose it in the surf at high tide (true story), or when you slam a drone into a brick building (also a true story). I find these more than capable for anything I've thrown at them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and amazing camera, they just need to make it more user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my daughter as a present, This is what she has to say about it: The video quality is very good and smooth. I did find hard figuring out the battery; It was a struggle opening the battery compartment. Another thing about the accessories that are included: I don’t know what they are for, which the manual should explain more clearly. Opening the package was also really hard. But after all this is sorted out, it’s a good quality and amazing camera for when you go to the beach. They just need to make it more practical.
customer_reviews.author: quantumorbit

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the reviews and purchased this camera instead of the expensive GoPro. While the sound quality is not as good I was very pleased with the purchase. I used it for a Spartan race twice. Had to work out some issues (with the way I was working it) on the first race but the next one came out great. It was not a perfect a picture as I've seen from GoPros but certainly worth the money when compared. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: You barely hear what you have recorded...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I kinda like the quality, but still my go pro session still better quality with 1080 than this camera, despite its making good pics and videos. But with 4k quality sometimes becomes very blurry kinda becomes pixels and goes back to normal. But sounds is terrible and makes me nervous. Very low, and you barely hear unless you stick your memory into computer and volume up all available speakers connected to your computer...
customer_reviews.author: Orhan

customer_reviews.title: very clear and good stabilization
customer_reviews.text: Tried the camera for the very first time today and was impressed with the quality of the video. Stabilization was very good. For the cost you could not ask for better. In fact the quality of the images and the camera itself is as good, if not better than higher priced action cameras. The instructions which you go on line to view the manual were pretty straight forward and easy to follow. The camera came with a lot of essential attachments that you do not have to pay extra for. They even provide you with 2 batteries. I used the bike attachment. Ended up buying 2 cameras, one for me and one for the wife.
customer_reviews.author: David Sigue

customer_reviews.title: Better than GoPro for most of us.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & affordable alternative to expensive GoPro Hero camera. $59 vs $399 plus it includes about $200 worth of accessories that you don't get with GoPro. As far as performance it is pretty good. Better battery life than GoPro 90 mins vs 50 mins. 4K video is only 25 frames per second vs GoPro 4k 60fps, but the default 1080 / 60fps on this camera is great enough for most of us. Pro athletes should go with the GoPro for higher frame rate and advanced image stabilization but for the rest of us, this camera is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L. Regedanz

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, for a great little price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to film my son's travel baseball games. I chose this particular camera based on reviews (it came highly recommended from some fellow travel baseball moms), the extra battery included, and the low price tag. I recommend downloading the user manual from the website to familiarize yourself with the different functions of the camera. This will also assist in setting up the camera. I chose to download the app to my husband's phone since I run Game Changer on my phone and did not want to interrupt scoring to get the camera set. I am excited about this purchase and cannot wait to capture some memories.
customer_reviews.author: Perbear31

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Disappoint! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a last minute vacation to Curaçao and wanted to capture our snorkeling adventures. I didn’t have the money to spend on a more expensive name brand camera and the reviews for this were promising. I am throughly impressed with this little camera, especially for the price! The picture and video quality were great. Battery life was good- we did a mix of videos and a still photos. Each charge was sufficient for our snorkel adventures. I highly recommend this camera to someone who wants to capture those beach adventures without breaking the bank. I also had no issues syncing the camera to my phone via WiFi which allowed for easy retrieval of the photos.
customer_reviews.author: JetSetter14

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof case broke
customer_reviews.text: According to the many positive reviews, I thought that I was making a good purchase for my trip to Riviera Maya. The catch on the waterproof case broke after the first time I used it. Needless to say it was a great disappointment! I was unable to take pictures and videos while snorkeling. I wished that I had invested more money and got a quality underwater camera!! I returned it and received a refund, but I bought memory cards, battery recharger, waterproof hand grip and head strap for which I paid money and have no use for.
customer_reviews.author: Sjkbp

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Extraordinary CS.
customer_reviews.text: After losing my Gopro when surfing, I decided to buy a rather cheap one in case I lose another one. This camera is pretty good for its cost. The video quality is okay, but the protecting case isn't 100% waterproof. The problem about this camera is its durability. The first one I bought stopped working about 3 weeks after the purchase. I received a free return, thankfully, and used the second one for 8 months, and now it stopped working again. It's just dead and not producing any image on the screen. I think this camera is okay for it's price, just don't expect too much. P.S. Extraordinary customer service. I appreciate the representative's help.
customer_reviews.author: Makarong

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s great. I got the $60 dollar one for my 8 year old. Picture quality is not good indoors without bright lights or night time, I assume. But during the daytime outdoors, it’s got good picture quality and has it mounted in his bicycle. Great little action camera. Ps. Had an issue with the battery cover(cap) on the camera. Customer service was fast and responses very quickly. They sent a new cover very fast. Really appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant1911

customer_reviews.title: Works fine at 60ft deep
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to find out what's going on in the water when fishing. The image quality is surprisingly good below the murky water of the Puget sound. The camera spent ~1h at various depth, some times as deep as 70ft. Not a single drop of water got inside the enclosure. The footage proved very valuable; I get to see a fish following the bait for a long distance before finally taking it in. Can't wait to go on more fishing trips with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Liming Wang

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading all the positive reviews I was skeptical, but for the price I figured it was worth a gamble. I wasn't disappointed. This camera is very lightweight but seems very solidly built. All the accessories are solidly made and sturdy (but I haven't tested the water resistance yet). It comes with two batteries and a charger, which is a big win. I strapped the camera to my head to capture my run down the mountain coaster at Holiday Valley in New York. The camera had no problems operating in the cold (unlike some other inexpensive cameras I've used) and the video quality was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, it's a small camera, the resolution of the videos is great outside, but inside houses, or places with low lighting the video and the photos are of low quality. I'm very proud of de camera. It works with a SanDisk 64GB Ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Apapacholy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use. Bought this because I misplaced my GoPro and cannot bring myself to spend that much again. Glad I did - this camera feels similar to my GoPro, connects easily to my phone and came with a lot of great accessories. I also found that I can use many of the accessories I previously purchased and didn't lose, which is even better. I knocked off 1 star because the casing came a bit scratched up, but not a major issue and I probably won't feel as bad when I start scratching it some more. I definitely miss not needing a case, but again, not a big deal. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: performance = price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take time lapse of a house build. Unfortunately, the advertising on this page misrepresented the camera's capabilities. However, this little thing took some very good photos, and videos throughout the trip. I did not expect it to do so well for the price that I paid. It does not compare to a Go-pro in performance, but then again it is a heck of a lot less expensive. Overall, I rate this thing well, but am disappointed in the advertising on this page misrepresenting its features.
customer_reviews.author: Hello my name is: satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Dosent come with Sd card
customer_reviews.text: Not touch screen so a little tricky to figure out which button does what and I got the hang of it :) dosent have the best quality image not gona lie.. but for the price it’s fine for what I’m using it for. Haven’t put it in water yet.. and there’s an app you can download to connect the screen to your phone that’s pretty cool that Download straight to my camera roll... Sometimes and just realized the battery life is horrible:( I just bought a memory card for it for over 600 hours but the battery maybe lasted three after a full charge.. comes with two batteries btw
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Adams

customer_reviews.title: Tons of attachments. Decent video at 1080p in good light.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to film drone footage. This product comes with every kind of attachment you can imagine. My best video footage is in 1080p at 30fps. This camera works best in the day time when it’s not so cloudy. It doesn’t adjust for low lighting, but it can be adjusted in post editing. I am still trying to figure out the still images, but I didn’t really buy it for photos. The mic picks up sound, but it will not be loud. I have not tried it in the water and that’s not my reason for purchasing it, but YouTube reviews say the water proof case is in fact water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher IXer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: so far the product arrived on time and in great shape. Box had padding to help prevent it from bouncing around while in transit. i love the fact that it has a separate charging station for the battery, the remote control is a really cool feature. Has plenty of attachments to mount pretty much anywhere . i bought this with the intention of using it for review my MTB trips to make better runs, but now ill be bringing it along on my honey moon to capture moments together. Cant wait to use it ill update once i take it down the trail see how she holds up to the abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Recznik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this camera especially for the low price compared to a GoPro. We bought it to take to the beach so we could take pictures and video under water with the waterproof case that is included. Unfortunately when we arrived, we realized the lense on the waterproof case was scratched so we weren’t able to actually take the camera in the water :( I recently reached out to customer service to see where I could purchase a new case, and not only did they response quickly but they sent us TWO brand new waterproof cases free of charge! So now we should be set for our trips for awhile :) Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: sshomsky

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my worst Amazon purchase yet. The problem isn't really the camera but the software. The EZ iCam app that is supposed to control the camera won't. My cell phone is a Samsung Galaxy S8+. I have watched YouTube videos showing the app controlling the camera and the video from the camera displaying on the cell phone. This appears dependent on whether your cell phone is supported or not. In my case it is not. I can record with the camera and then remove the memory card and watch the videos on my laptop. But no live streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Mayoli

customer_reviews.title: Starter Kid- 5 stars for customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera (along with an entire accessory kit) for my aspiring you-tuber 8 year old son. It syncs with your phone for digital upload by way of app, which is very simple an easy to do. It is very lightweight and sturdy (as it comes with a protective case.) They only problem that we have run into is picking up static white noise when in action. We bought a noise reduction lapel mic, but in order to connect it to the camera, you can't have the camera enclosed in the case (which means you can't attach any of the accessories; i.e. tripod, head band, chest strap.)
customer_reviews.author: gahleexholly

customer_reviews.title: Best of the inexpensive action cam packages by far
customer_reviews.text: I've had three or four of these little action cam packages so far, for myself and also to give as gifts. This package by Akaso is by far the best of the lot so far - all the mounting pieces fit well, they're all packaged well, and you even get a battery charger and TWO batteries! Well done, Akaso. Camera fired up right out of the box, batteries charged in under an hour, and all modes test out just fine. Also, I like the opening mechanism of the plastic case, it snaps open easily and doesn't require a jeweler's screwdriver and three hands to open up. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Hare

customer_reviews.title: Cheeply made
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday. Opened up battery cover and popped battery in and took some videos today. When the battery died I opened the battery compartment and the clip for the door broke. Two uses is all it lasted, checking on Google it seems to be a known issue.....junk it seems
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, need more accessories for motorcycles though
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great picture quality is great stabilization is great. However they don't have a handlebar mount for motorcycles. They have one for bicycles but that one will not fit around motorcycle handlebars. I really did not want to mount it on my helmet because of wind lift, after a while wind lift will really start to hurt your neck. The adhesives do not last long especially when it gets hot out so be careful because they do not hold . That is my only complaint about this camera otherwise it's fantastic for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use - Software interface design failure
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing to me that this product can be produced for such a low price and include so many accessories. Even if the most commonly desired accessory type for headwear is not included... It is also amazing to me that the device is incredibly and unnecessarily complicated because of the lack of a basic traditional menu layout. The user has to literally learn a new method of communication that requires pressing a series of buttons in a certain order to access basic menu functions such as ‘delete’ for a video clip. ‘Click this button once and then jump up and down on one foot and then press this button twice...’ Why? Not even close to being intuitive. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: RAZE

customer_reviews.title: Power hog - Not good when taking a trip
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this is how it drains the battery. The battery only lasts about 1/2 an hour. I get a little more by attaching an external battery pack. The device indicates that it is charging but still quits after a while. Not good when taking a trip. The picture and sound are quite good. It has many features, such as single photos, stop action, etc. I can't think of any case where I'd be using the extra features. There was a whole slough of items included for attaching the camera to many places. At this time I wouldn't recommend buying this until the manufacturer does something about the power consumption.
customer_reviews.author: crsangel

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture! See my hiking videos (2 min edited videos of various epic hikes) on earthy4life.com. Everything shot after 9/15th was shot with this camera. I could not be happier. I had a GoPro Hero 5+ Black or whichever edition was the more expensive version and I had endless problems for it. I paid like $500+ for that camera without any of the goodies. This one is so cheap and I'm getting better clarity and reliability. Plus, the battery life is better and the display on the back is key for getting the composition just right. Love this camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McGivney

customer_reviews.title: Quality Video.  Very Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrific camera. Image quality is great. However, the best thing about this phone is the quality of the build. I had the water proof case on it, but I drilled a hole on it to attach an external battery to it. So, no longer water proof. I strapped it to a near space balloon, it traveled to an altitude of 70,000 feet, landed in a lake, sat under water at a depth of 20 feet for over 30 minutes, and still worked after I recovered it and dryed it out. I don't suggest submerging it under water, but the thing is a beast. For the price, it's unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: scienceguylabs

customer_reviews.title: This is one nifty camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had my reservations buying this camera, given the price, but the quality, hardiness and overall tech of the camera sold me! It comes with several mounts and other handy gadgets, including a remote on a wristband to snap pics or video of things you may not want to get too close to. Thankfully, an online manual is available because the info included is minimal and not easy to understand. There are handy videos posted on YouTube by other consumers to further educate. The waterproof housing is tough and nicely insulated. The quality for the price is a great alternative to the much pricier camera that rhymes with "Pro-Go".
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the action cam thing, so wanted one that was easy on price but produced relatively good video quality. I purchased it to film my kid's soccer games mounting it on a tripod with and extender. The videos came out relatively well and was able to make out the players while filming from midfield. Also, this camera came with a bunch of accessories and replacement parts. I am completely happy with the product and would recommend it for those that want to try out an action cam without making a big investment.
customer_reviews.author: Felix S.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My first camera i received worked well for about 5 months than stopped working. But that being said. The company reached out to me. And handled the issue very well. Rebecca was very professional and helpful. Replaced the camera right away. She checked in afterwards to make sure the new camera worked. And so far so good. For the price you can't beat it. My husband does a lot of fishing with friends and is great with outdoors and underwater. 4 stars for just the inconvenience issues but 5 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prefect just what I needed for my trip
customer_reviews.text: this product is great got me out of a few traffic jams that I battled in court came with a lot of different parts and the pictures is great. The quality of the hard waterproof casing seems to be in excellent shape but haven't tried it yet and I hope that I don't have to either since stuff like this gets destroyed when wet. It also came with a few accessories that I also needed. The set up is a breeze and easy to understand. I can't wait to try this on my vacation that I had to now reschedule cause of the virus outbreak.
customer_reviews.author: paydro2208Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera,  however confusing at times.
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically for our river trip. I've had one other very nice water camera in the past and they seem to be equally amazing. However, not much instruction was included. Unboxing and unlocking the screwing mechanism to secure to standardization accessories was a total mystery... words of wisdom, find the little screwdriver key 🤷🏻‍♀️😂👌🏼 also, the remote included is a really cool plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Watona

customer_reviews.title: Biased reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 9-yea my son. It came with lots of accessories which is a huge plus. The remote is handy. However the video keeps freezing when shooting at 4K mode. Video stabilization is not close to GoPro. For 43$ I will keep it as picture model and 1080p video still work. One thing I really loathe is that the seller offers free accessories in change for positive reviews. I have to admit that the free gifts are very attempting. I was wondering how many of 10+k reviews are actually honest reviews. This is nothing but bribery. Amazon should do something to stop this nonsense!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie W.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a starter / beginners "action" camera and couldn't be happier. For the price, the picture quality matches. So far i have only used as a dash-cam (window mount:  to test it out till next summer when i can take the jeep out on the trail. I CAN NOT wait! **Only complaint i have is that i cannot seem to get it to fit all the way into the other mount if i don't want it in the waterproof case (see pictures) (I've tried flipping it both ways, same end result) ***If its in the waterproof case, manual says no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet camera
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this camera when I ride. I have taken it in my city and rural area rides, and it has proven to be a quality camera that can sustain fast-moving images. Video Quality is great, and the external memory, it is very easy to swap memory cards. Also, I really like the remote control feature that I come with, which you can wear on your wrist or attach it elsewhere to quickly turn start/stop recording or take a picture. Comes with the accessories that you would need to mount this little camera on your bike.
customer_reviews.author: 92XRT

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera with very nice features. There are many pieces to be able to mount in various styles and positions to fit whatever need you may have. The video quality is crisp and clear and the pictures are equal. I had an issue with the camera when I first purchased it, but Rachel at Akaso customer service went above and beyond to correct the issue. Customer service is fantastic. That's not easy to come by these days... I will definitely buy from them again and I recommend this "go" camera if you're in the market looking for one!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera does what it does exceptionally well for the price. I purchased this camera so that I could take some video's of my son and I skiing and it accomplished that task very well. The battery life is around two hours of moderate use, but since they ship you two batteries, swapping the two gives decent coverage. They provide all of mounts that you could need, of which I have only used the helmet mount, but it worked perfectly. While the camera doesn't have some of the features of more expensive models (i.e. image stabilization, webcam support, etc...) it does exactly what I needed it to do, at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: JHall

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my son. For the price, I wasn't too worried about it being ruined as compared to more expensive cameras. It came with everything he needed to get up and running. The video quality is awesome and can be easily compared to that of your iPhone or better. Sound quality is great even in the waterproof case. We have used it both fresh and salt water without any issues with the provided case. Battery run time seems reasonable, we haven't run it out during an adventure and there are two batteries provided. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Wise

customer_reviews.title: Recommend- Good quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owed a small camera like this one or even a GoPro. However, this camera is great and especially for the price ! My husband and I went away to a cabin for our anniversary and we took this camera with us. It takes amazing pictures and videos! ONE IMPORTANT PIECE OF INFO - When trying to connect the camera Wi-Fi. The camera itself is the WiFi. You have to connect to the camera. I tried for hours to connect the camera to the internet. Then I figured out the camera has its own internet. Very good camera and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: his4ever2020always

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have recently gotten into air-soft, and wanted an action camera to record my game play. After doing a lot of searching, I decided on this camera, and i have been very satisfied with it. The camera has a very easy to learn controls and shoots at a high quality. I was surprised at the amount of mounting accessories that came with it, as well as the two batteries. It is definitely worth the price, and has held up to my expectations. Attached is a video i took with the camera as a test.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Video, Audio is a Little Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this camera, but the audio recording volume is a little low. I have to turn it all the way up on playback on my computer and it's still pretty quiet. But if audio from far away isn't a priority or if you have an off-camera recording device for audio, this is a great little camera with a nice collection of accessories. Nice wide-angle video and easy to use interface. Also, it does not come with a chest strap. UPDATE- Working with the customer service department on this camera is really fantastic. They are super responsive and helpful and will bend over backwards to help their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Stevens

customer_reviews.title: neat camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii, as we had planned some snorkeling and beach trips. Didn't really get the chance to use the camera as much as I wanted, but the few images and videos I did get were pretty neat. Quality of photos and videos are nice. Camera was easy enough to figure out how to work. I haven't encountered any issues so far. Definitely like that there are 2 batteries for this camera, so I can swap out when needed. Will definitely have to keep playing with this camera in other settings, just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Watt

customer_reviews.title: Not for SCUBA
customer_reviews.text: We did our checking and per the reviews this was the one. The pics on land were good and the snorkeling were fine. However, under water the pics were terrible. We bought this camera ( 2 of them) for Cozumel for our SCUBA certification. We were so disappointed in the lack of quality. We took over 300 pictures and none of them our worth saving. We will never get this opportunity back but we are looking for a better camera for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Qadave

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Thought about going the cheaper route since I own every GoPro but it’s starting to get hard to keep up with them because they are coming out with new ones every few months it seems. This is not the best product but for the price I guess it’s good. The image stabilizer in this device is horrid, seems like the only thing it’s good for is pictures. It is not meant to be an action camera because of the image stabilization is lacking. Will not buy one of these again, but good for beginners and those who don’t have the $ for a GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Dominic C

customer_reviews.title: Great value compared to Hero
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for action shots in the water during vacation. Took it underwater (maybe 3ft) in the ocean and on a waterslide multiple times. Included waterproof case works perfect, never had any fogging or leakage issues. The video quality turned out fine, even in varying light levels. The only thing lacking is the audio, which I know in a waterproof case is expecting a lot, but even out of the case the recorded audio is extremely quiet. Overall, with all of the mounting hardware and accessories included, you cannot go wrong at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: JD33

customer_reviews.title: Worked For A While, Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera for a couple of months and at first it worked great taking nice quality video with reasonably good sound too. Then it started having a problem where it SEEMED to be recording video but it was not. This caused me problems on two separate occasions where it showed that it was recording but it didn't. It just went into the trash. Akaso customer service read my review and took care of me by issuing a refund! I'm astounded. In the meantime I purchased the EK7000 Pro version which I like very much and I feel is worth the extra money over the base model.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Customer Service is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not well versed in action cameras, but it seems hard to beat for the price. The customer service is also some of the best around, at least in my experience. ---Old review for clarity below--- *Picture taken with smartphone, not this camera. Haven't have much of a chance to use it yet, but I was a little disappointed that the camera didn't come with the second type of cable I needed. The tiny lcd screen is much nicer than I expected for the price. One of the metal mounts didn't come with it. It didn't fall out in packaging, so that's just a minor gripe
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sivers

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Budget Action Cam!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little action cam for the money, especially when you consider that it comes with several attachments included and TWO batteries! I use it for recording bicycle rides and hiking trips. The only downside is that the battery life is only about an hour and a half on a full charge, but I don't know how that compares to other action cams. And the batteries are small, you can carry one in a small pocket and change it out for another 90 minutes or so of filming. For the $50 I paid for this, a real bargain in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J. Enterkin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We recently went snorkeling in Honduras and Belize, and this camera did wonderfully. Video was perfect as were the stills. Went down about 30 feet and the waterproof case held up as advertised. Just like photos on land, shoot away from the sun to avoid too much green tinging under the water. I've also used a GoPro Hero which offers the same features, for more than triple the cost of this...there was no difference in quality. Thank you Akaso for allowing me to shoot such great memories of this trip!
customer_reviews.author: Kawigirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't.... just don't
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. The device is super small and difficult to handle, especially under water. I hooked an elastic ponytail holder to it to keep from losing it at the bottom of the ocean. The remote is futile. It's a lot wrong with this product besides it being a teeny tiny camera. I planned to return but time ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: It's works fine as long as you don't expect it as a 4K action CAM.
customer_reviews.text: This one works for fine for me till now, I honestly said I didn't do much recording so don't take my opinion too serious this time. I only turns on this as a 1080P camera cause too many people claim the 4K quality is not good. So I didn't ever test that out. But As for the normal 1080P use, this is a great one, with many amenities, 2 battery and a protection case. Don't expect a $50,60 CAM can beats those $3-400 one, if you compares this to new model of Go Pro. Maybe the 1080P quality can match, but definitely not 4K. That technology is too expensive for this price, Right?
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but  what about date and time?????
customer_reviews.text: While the picture is great, it appears that you have to set the date and time every time you change the battery. I haven't found anything in the manual that will save the date and time permanently which is unacceptable. Well I just found it #11. It says "if you replace the battery, date and time will reset". WT???????
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Can't keep the time
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the use case(Like to shield the owner from liability, dash cam, body cam, ect) You need to have an accurate date and time. The issue here is, You can't. They include two batteries, But you cannot remove the battery from the camera without resetting the clock. This is a huge design flaw. Imagine if your phone died and you had to keep resetting the time/date? The seller recommendation is to charge the device via USB to keep from having to change the battery/clock.
customer_reviews.author: Heve Stagenlock

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and they said the batteries do not last very long
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give an accurate review because I have not seen any videos or pictures from this. It was a gift and I was told the batteries drain quickly. I am not sure how quick is quickly. I did overhear more people give the advice of saying if you lowered the resolution the batteries last longer (or something like that). As I said I cannot give an accurate review until we learn a little more about it. That is why I went 3's across the board. If I have more info, I'll update this. I hope it goes up to a 5 :)
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Former Go Pro Owner
customer_reviews.text: This is my third action-based camera. The first two were both Go Pros; lost one to the Ocean and one to a breakup. Overall the picture quality is on par if not better, the sound isn't quite as good with the waterproof case on, but with it off it isn't noticeable. (makes no difference if you use an external microphone). The App that connects the camera to the phone is surprisingly good, but not necessary. This is essentially a stripped-down go pro, great camera, lesser microphone cheaper battery lock-in system. For the price this is great! would buy again (hopefully wont loose this one)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera at an unbelievable price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a sound investment if you don’t wanna spend $500+ on a device that has almost the same quality. The package comes with all the accessories you’ll need to mount it anywhere. Voice recording is always loud and clear. A single battery can last about 2+ hours of continuous recording. Attached photos are the unit itself and some screenshots I took from a 1080p recording at a biker rally this morning. I haven’t tried 4K yet but I’m sure it would be significantly better, but also requires more power of course. If you are on a budget but still want a solid travel camera, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera
customer_reviews.text: After playing with the EK7000 for a while, I can say that this is one of the better low-cost GoPro competitors. It’s one of the GoPro competitors that has taken off in popularity, and after playing with it for a while I can see why. It shoots 4K video (at 25fps), takes 12MP still photos, comes with a waterproof housing, and uses the same mounting system. It’s even packaged the same way a GoPro is packaged, with the distinctive clear perspex bubble on top. But it’s simpler to use. And it’s much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures!  Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my husband to use while scuba diving. The camera is very compact, came with a lot of accessories and 2 batteries. I added a separate memory card as recommended. While he has not used it for scuba diving yet, we have used it biking, kayaking and just walking around. The pictures have been great. The camera is easy to use. The most complicated part is figuring out all the attachments. Looking forward to many pictures and videos we would not have been able to capture with our phones. Extremely happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great camera BUT missing external mic option
customer_reviews.text: Image quality and video quality are both fantastic. Stable, plenty of mounting options and accessories in the setup so you can use it on just about anything. My one and only gripe is that the built in microphone is subpar at best and does not come with any capability of connecting an external mic (for uses like recording music cover videos). With that being said, if you are not doing any sort of music video shooting, or at least not a lot, THIS IS YOUR CAMERA. makes for a great dash cam as well, which is what I decided to use it as.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video on this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I purchased this camera on amazon as a replacement for another camera (different brand) that wouldn’t even turn on. This one happened to be a lightening deal so I decided to buy it. I’m so glad that I did. My husband loves it and has it mounted to his helmet when he rides his OneWheel. The videos are really good. It recently came in handy after someone nearly hit him and we were able to give footage to the police. I’d definitely purchase this one again if I ever needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Impressive little camera for the price, loaded with video and still photo features in a compact size. More impressive was the included accessories, including waterproof case, 6 mounts, 2 batteries plus charger, battery operated remote (battery included) numerous straps, handlebar mount and more. Initial test video provided clear, color accurate views with minor vibration (which could have been the result of my using a non-recommended mount set-up (helps to read the manual). I'm impressed and would recommend purchasing for a first time buyer looking for a GoPro compatible camera.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE D. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: just got it, not happy
customer_reviews.text: so it apparently won't take an sd card bigger than 32gb. how do i know this? not from anything that it said on the product page or in the user manual. i learn it from a video on youtube explaining all the stuff about this camera that no one bothered to write anywhere. the terrible manual and support for this camera explains why it's so cheap. i'm not very happy since my SD card is too large and i cannot use this camera until i get a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E Gross

customer_reviews.title: For what it is, it's not bad!
customer_reviews.text: It's not going to cook you supper or walk your dog, but you could clip this little bugger onto your dog and get some pretty great footage! The still camera footage is so/so, but my mom wants something little she can strap to her walker and get some action shots of her walks around the block and of Lake Michigan without breaking the bank. At less than $50, you can't ask for much more. This thing has a zillion attachments and if Mom ever decided she needs to try parasailing, it comes with a waterproof case. Slick!
customer_reviews.author: JMH

product_meta.title: AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle
feature_bullets: 4K Ultra HD action camera. Professional 4K 25Fps & 2.7K 30Fps video with 12MP photos at up to 30 frames per second for incredible photos, which is 4 times the resolution of traditional HD cameras.
Wireless wrist remote control sports camera. With a wrist 2.4G remote, you can capture the world in an all-new way. Controlling the camera, framing shots or recording video is convenient.
Longer battery life. AKASO EK7000 action camera comes with 2 rechargeable 1050mAh batteries. Each battery can record up to 90 minutes. No more worry about the recording time for this Action camera.
Built-in Wi-Fi & HDMI, edit & share YOUR action in minutes. Just download App(smart DV) on your phone or tablet and connect with this action camera. Wi-Fi signal ranges up to 10 meters.
100 Feet waterproof camera. AKASO EK7000 is designed to withstand extreme environments, together with durable waterproof case. With the accessories, transform it for indoor and outdoor activities.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars15,936 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
